name: Bot Status Checker
description: This bot will check bots listed in a channel and add mark if any bot is offline

Channel_ID.description: The channel you want to check bots listed in it

Offline_Mark.description: This mark will added after bot username if it is offline

Send_Time.description: Wait for this period before checking another bot (in seconds)

UserName_Time.description: Wait for this period after checking the bot by username (in seconds)

Time_Out.description: Wait for this period for any bot to respond (in seconds)

Sleep_Time.description: Wait for this period before checking all bots again (in seconds)
